security_audit.summary: Pure documentation skill containing only markdown guidelines. No executable code, scripts, network calls, file system access, or environment variable usage. This is a prompt-based skill that provides development guidance to AI agents.

content.value_statement: Frontend code requires consistent patterns for Next.js 15 features like Server Components and App Router. This skill provides comprehensive guidelines for React 19, TypeScript, Shadcn/ui components, and Tailwind CSS to ensure maintainable and performant applications.
actual_capabilities: Generate Server and Client Components following Next.js 15 patterns
Set up App Router file structure with proper route organization
Implement data fetching with Server Components and Server Actions
Apply Shadcn/ui components and Tailwind CSS styling patterns
Configure TypeScript with strict typing and explicit prop types
Create loading states and error boundaries for route resilience
limitations: Does not generate full application code or project scaffolding
Does not install dependencies or configure build tools
Does not interact with external APIs or databases directly
Focuses on frontend patterns only, backend integration not covered

best_practices: Default to Server Components for data fetching and rendering to reduce bundle size
Use Shadcn/ui components from @/components/ui with Tailwind CSS for consistent styling
Apply strict TypeScript with explicit prop types and no implicit any
anti_patterns: Avoid adding 'use client' unnecessarily - it increases bundle size and disables Server Component benefits
Do not use useEffect for data fetching in Server Components - fetch directly instead
Avoid inline styles - use Tailwind CSS utility classes and cn() helper for conditional classes

faq.question: Is this skill compatible with older Next.js versions?
faq.answer: This skill targets Next.js 15 specifically. Some patterns like Server Components and App Router work in Next.js 13+, but syntax may differ.

faq.question: What are the limits of the Server Component patterns?
faq.answer: Server Components cannot use hooks, browser APIs, or event handlers. Move interactivity to Client Components and wrap with Suspense.

faq.question: Can I use this with other UI component libraries?
faq.answer: This skill focuses on Shadcn/ui patterns. The general principles apply to other libraries but import paths and class names will differ.

faq.question: Is my data safe when using Server Components?
faq.answer: Yes. Server Components execute on your infrastructure. Data never leaves your server - it is fetched and rendered before sending HTML to the client.

faq.question: Why is my component rendering on the client instead of server?
faq.answer: Check for 'use client' directive at the top. If missing, ensure no hooks, browser APIs, or event handlers are used. Remove any client-side patterns.

faq.question: How does this compare to other frontend skills?
faq.answer: This skill provides detailed Next.js 15 patterns. Combine with general React skills for component lifecycle or CSS skills for custom styling beyond Tailwind.
